properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He mahagaga Ianao
Mpamonjy Tomponay
O ! voavotra tokoa 'zahay
Fa voaloa ny trosanay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Kanto loatra Jeso
Ny namonjenao anay
Mahagaga Ianao
Fa Mpamonjy mahay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ankalazainay Ianao
Noho 'lay ra manadio
'Zay nampihavana anay
Taminao sy taminay
Kanto loatra, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Te hiara-mamindra Aminao
Izahay Jeso tia Ã´
Tsy hivily na hania
Fa ho tody soa ary.
Kanto loatra, sns.
